title: Foundational Course in Medical-Surgical Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Delivered via video lectures and text materials optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Basic concepts and procedures of medical-surgical nursing can be explained with over 80% accuracy
Enumerate and apply at least three pre- and post-operative patient care protocols
Classify and explain the steps of infection control and aseptic technique into four or more stages

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
